flawed_nl_solution:
Tommy has a total of 20 x 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 kilograms of tomatoes.
Only 60 - 3 = <<60-3=57>>57 kilograms can be sold.
His earnings for the tomatoes will be $342=<<342=342>>342.
Thus, his profit will be $342 - $330 = $<<342-330=9>>9.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
